body:
Ain't gonna lie, this is by far my most favorite tankoubon. I wish there were more sentou episode but everything is perfect even the non public bath. This is the real definition of good bitches. I hope the author makes a sequel for the public bath. Maybe those 3 goes to a vacation and fck everybody, bus, hotspring, touist spot, everywhere lmao.

For those who wants translation, it's all about girls being so thirsty
